title: EasyPHP 13.1 VC9
description:
EasyPHP is a complete WAMP environment for PHP development & personal web hosting

PHP DEVELOPMENT
with EasyPHP DevServer


EasyPHP DevServer (for PHP development) installs a complete WAMP environment for PHP developers including PHP, Apache, MySQL, PhpMyAdmin, Xdebug...

EasyPHP DevServer is portable : hard drive, usb drive, memory card, cloud, dropbox...


PHP 5.5.x PHP 5.4.x PHP 5.3.x PHP 5.2.x
and Apache 2.4.4 VC9/11 + MySQL 5.6.11 + PhpMyAdmin 4.0.3 + Xdebug 2.2.3
                        + plus +
Update components
Download and install new components: PHP 5.5.x / 5.4.x / PHP 5.3.x / 5.2.x VC9, Nginx, PostgreSQL, MongoDB ...

                        + plus +

ADD MODULES
Add functionalites by downloading and installing modules: Virtual Hosts Manager, Xdebug Manager, WebGrind, PhpMyAdmin, Wordpress, Drupal, Joomla!, Spip...

--> Tips :

*for beginners : download the latest version of EasyPHP and the modules Coding Standards and Function Reference
 
*for advanced programmers : download the latest version of EasyPHP and the modules Xdebug Manager and WebGrind

*for people working with web applications : download the latest version of EasyPHP and the modules WordPress, Prestashop, Drupal, Joomla! ...
